items.sentence: What makes you think that Tom wasn't the one who did that?
Tom already knows that Mary will be at his birthday party.
Just be sure that you don't do that where Tom can see you.
I could tell Tom was from Australia because of his accent.
Since Tom had a bad cold, he was absent from school today.
I knew that I shouldn't do it, but I couldn't help myself.
I don't think that Tom knows who gave this umbrella to me.
I'm sorry that I wasn't able to be at your birthday party.
How much longer do you think it'll take to reach our goal?
I heard a voice in my head urging me to go to Tom's house.
Tom seemed to be unwilling to do what we wanted him to do.
Tom, I'm afraid I haven't been completely honest with you.
It was one of the most beautiful things Tom had ever seen.
Tom received a grant from the National Science Foundation.
Tom constantly posts pictures of his life on social media.
Why do you always have to insist on doing things your way?
Tom sustained serious burns and had to go to the hospital.
This is the house where my father was born and brought up.
Tom didn't know which direction Mary would be coming from.
Recently, 24 hours per day hasn't really felt like enough.
